reviews.title: 2 nights in Almeria

mgmtResponse.text:
Dear Pirate66

We thank you for your review by which you help us improve day by day, we hope to see you again soon.

Best Regards

reviews.text: We have just had a really good 2 night stay here and the hotel did exactly what it said on the tin. It was in a great location for the centre and great views out to sea and across at the port. We paid extra to park at the hotel however looking at other charges this was a cheaper option we believe. We didn’t eat or drink at the hotel as there was so many great options around and then we brought our own drinks to sit out on the balcony and enjoy the views. Rooms clean although some areas needed updating but nothing to spoil our stay.

reviews.title: Average hotel, good location, terrible food.
reviews.roomTip: Underground parking is extremely narrow, and no elevator to the main hotel
reviews.text: Great location, reasonably clean rooms and the staff are friendly. The hotel could certainly use an update. Avoid the food at all costs, it's absolutely terrible and certainly not worth the extra cost. Average experience, I'm sure there are better options for the price.

reviews.title: A very pleasant hotel

mgmtResponse.text:
Dear Jackiew296,

Thank you very much for choosing us for your stay in Almeria.

Thank you again for choosing Gran Hotel Amería for your visit to Almería and for taking part of your time to write this comment. Your opinion is very valuable to us.

Our greatest motivation is to satisfy customers , so we appreciate your observation, and we get to work to make improvements in regards. 
We hope to see you soon and give us another chance to improve your experience.

Receive a cordial greeting on behalf of the entire Gran Hotel Almería team.

reviews.text:
An ideally situated very stylish hotel with rooms overlooking the sea and port. Having a balcony with such a lovely view is a real bonus as is the swimming pool with its comfortable loungers. 
The whole hotel was sparklingly clean and the staff very friendly and helpful. 
For me the only negatives were the very protracted check-in process and the rather expensive breakfast - we only wanted coffee!

reviews.title: Friendly staff but terrible soundproofing in the bedrooms

mgmtResponse.text:
Dear Almería2020,

We thank you for taking the time to share with us and many other readers your comments about your experience at our hotel.

We remain at your entire disposal and we hope you visit us again and enjoy Gran Hotel Almería.

Sincerely yours,

reviews.roomTip: High and at the end of corridor.
reviews.text:
Location - right by the port, so handy for the old town and the beaches.

Staff - the best part about this hotel. Very friendly female receptionist and lovely male waiters/bar staff.

Bedrooms - I asked for a quiet twin room. To be fair, they had kindly upgraded us to a 6th floor suite but it had a double bed, and was located right between the 2 lifts shafts, so not quiet at all. They then moved us to a 2nd floor room, which has to be the worst soundproofing I´ve come across in many years  ..... the noise from the event (music allowed until 1am), the guests drinking by the pool terrace, the traffic outside (specifically motorbikes, buses and police sirens), every word from guests walking along the corridor and even most of the sounds from the adjoining bedrooms. We were offered another room, but we decided to check-out.

Parking - 12 spaces under the hotel for €16 a night. If these are booked, there are 3 nearby options. Puerto de Almería, Plaza López Falcón, Parking Oliveros. 

Pool - small with a few sunbeds and chairs/tables.

Bar - nicely decorated with a small selection of food.

€72 for two people for bed & breakfast. I prefer Nuevo Torreluz & AC at a similar price.

reviews.title: Tired hotel

reviews.text:
This is in a great location right in the centre and at the beach .  Parking is 10 euro a night.  No kettle and coffee in the room despite having that in the Ohtel in Gibraltar
The place is dated and tired but clean enough.  Breakfast was ok plenty of choice !
